Articles.Content: I Noticed the Contract button in the hotbar in x64 version is missing from my game,  I took a position unmanned satalite mission for control center then when i went to make the rocket i wanted to make sure i had the correct part. but when i went to make the rocket the button was missing.  Normally not a problem but when i thought about getting the satalite in orbit i realized i needed the info in the button to get the correct numbers for orbit.  the i realized the button that give info on the current rocket built (like number of parts and weight) was missing too,  the when i went to the x32 version the buttons were there and worked correctly.
